name: VGA Planets "Nu", the official remake
blurb: VGA Planets "Nu" is the official web-based remake of the original VGA Planets space strategy game released in 1991 by Tim Wisseman.

rewards.reward: We\u2019ll put your name or game-name in the game credits page on the vgaplanets.nu website and you\u2019ll be invited to participate in the \u201cearly-release\u201d beta-testing games.  You\u2019ll also receive our sincere gratitude.
Credit, gratitude and early release, plus a set of cool VGA Planets stickers.
Credit, gratitude and early release plus you\u2019ll receive a free 6 month vgaplanets.nu registered player subscription ($18 value).
Credit, gratitude and early release, plus a 1 year vgaplanets.nu registered player subscription ($30 value).
Credit, gratitude and early release, and a high quality, vintage VGA Planets t-shirt. \u201cPlay by Email Gaming since 1991\u201d.
Credit, gratitude and early release plus a 2 year registered vgaplanets.nu subscription ($60 value).
Credit, gratitude and early release, plus a 1 year vgaplanet.nu registered player subscription ($30 value) and a set of vintage VGA Planets stickers.
Credit, gratitude and early release, a set of VGA Planets stickers, and a high quality, vintage VGA Planets t-shirt. \u201cPlay by Email Gaming since 1991\u201d.

Credit, gratitude, early release, stickers, plus a 2 year registered subscription ($60 value) and a seat on the official \u201cVGA Planets Game Council\u201d with a vote on any proposed changes to the game.

Credit, gratitude, early release, stickers, a 1 year registered subscription ($30 value) and a seat on the game council, plus, we\u2019ll send you a beautiful 24\u201dx36\u201d official VGA Planets poster map depicting the original Echo Cluster.

Credit, gratitude, early release, stickers, a seat on the game council plus a 3 year registered user subscription ($90 value) and a high quality, vintage VGA Planets t-shirt. \u201cPlay by Email Gaming since 1991\u201d.

Credit, gratitude, early release, stickers, a seat on the game council, a t-shirt and a permanent, lifetime registered user subscription so you can play planets for free, forever.  Plus, we\u2019ll send you a beautiful 24\u201dx36\u201d official VGA Planets poster map depicting the original Echo Cluster.

Credit, gratitude, early release, stickers, a seat on the game council, the poster map of the echo cluster, a permanent lifetime subscription, plus we will send you a high quality, vintage VGA Planets t-shirt autographed by Tim Wisseman himself!  The creator of the original game.  \r\n\r\nIn addition, we\u2019ll send flowers to you, or the loved one in your life who supports your avid gaming.

Credit, gratitude, early release, stickers, a seat on the game council, a permanent lifetime subscription, the poster map of the echo cluster, a Tim Wisseman autographed t-shirt, flowers for your loved one, PLUS we will rename a planet in the Echo Cluster after you (or a name of your choosing) so you can go down in history as a permanent part of the game itself.
